overview: The world-renowned Takacs Quartet plays through three works by Hungarian composer Béla Bartók, with fascinating interview footage of the ensemble members introducing and explaining each piece. Filmed at England's historic, elegant Hatchlands Park, this live concert includes the selections Quartet for Strings no. 2 in A Minor, Quartet for Strings no. 3 and Quartet for Strings no. 6.
title: Takacs Quartet: Bartok: String Quartets 2, 3 & 6
